channel.title: python on ExampleSite
channel.description: Recent content in python on ExampleSite

item.title: linux下 安装tesseract和 python使用tesseract-ocr进行图片识别
item.description: centos7安装依赖库 yum install -y automake autoconf libtool gcc gcc-c++ yum install -y libpng-devel libjpeg-devel libtiff-devel yum -y install python-devel yum -y install openssl-devel yum -y install opencv yum install -y libffi libffi-devel yum install libmount -y 如果需要tesseract，则需要安装leptonica http://www.leptonica.org/download.html https://github.com/DanBloomberg/leptonica wget https://github.com/DanBloomberg/leptonica/archive/1.79.0.zip unzip 1.79.0.zip cd 1.79.0/ ./autogen.sh ./configure make && make install 安装tesseract4 .0 https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract wget https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/archive/5.0.0-alpha.zip 或者下面这个 wget http://linux-1251121573.cosgz.myqcloud.com/soft/tesseract/4.0.0-beta.1.tar.gz unzip master.zip cd tesseract-master/ ./autogen.sh ./configure make && make install ldconfig .
